name: NBCNews
text: As schools switch to remote learning because of the coronavirus pandemic, many Native American communities are facing major obstacles — including access to Wi-Fi, devices and electricity. https://t.co/jgkryzypTJ

name: NBCNews
text:
At least a dozen states are soaring to all-time highs for Covid-19 hospitalizations. 

In states like Wisconsin, where the average daily number of deaths have more than tripled, ICU beds are now at 90% capacity. 
https://t.co/d6fjDTW0oE

name: NBCNews
text: Voter depression targeting Black communities online are picking up momentum because, according to researchers, they’re coming from accounts people already have relationships with and appear to be authentic. https://t.co/UZxYOnYhTd
